class.name: SxGlobalMusicPlayer
class.brief_description: A global audio player, used to play sound tracks during the game.
class.description: A global audio player, used to play sound tracks, to be used through inheritance as an autoload (see <<_sxglobalaudiofxplayer>>).

method.name: fade_in
method.description:
Apply a "fade in" effect on sound with an optional duration in seconds.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- # Suppose we have an instance of `SxGlobalMusicPlayer` as an autoload named `GameGlobalMusicPlayer`. GameGlobalMusicPlayer.fade_in() ----

method.name: fade_out
method.description:
Apply a "fade out" effect on sound with an optional duration in seconds.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- # Suppose we have an instance of `SxGlobalMusicPlayer` as an autoload named `GameGlobalMusicPlayer`. GameGlobalMusicPlayer.fade_out() ----

method.name: play_stream
method.description:
Play an audio stream.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- # Suppose we have an instance of `SxGlobalMusicPlayer` as an autoload named `GameGlobalMusicPlayer`. GameGlobalMusicPlayer.play_stream(my_sound) ----

members.member: Used to query/set the global volume
